text: Jeffrey Lance Baena (June 29, 1977 â€“ January 3, 2025) was an American screenwriter and movie director. He wrote and directed Life After Beth (2014), Joshy (2016), The Little Hours (2017), Horse Girl (2020), and Spin Me Round (2022), and co-wrote I Heart Huckabees (2004). Baena was married to actress Aubrey Plaza from 2021 until his death. On January 3, 2025, Baena was found dead at his home in Los Angeles, California at the age of 47. His death was ruled as suicide by hanging. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1977 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Movie directors from Florida Category:Screenwriters from Florida Category:Writers from Miami Category:American television directors Category:American television producers Category:American television writers Category:Movie producers from Florida
title: Jeff Baena
